title: Cup with Straw
description:
A drinking cup with a straw. Depicted on many platforms as a disposable cup with a lid and bendy straw, as used to serve soft drinks at fast-food restaurants. May be used for a range of non-alcoholic beverages, including milkshakes, smoothies, juice, and to-go beverages.

Color and design vary by platform. Twitter's design suggests a glass of water, while Samsung's previously displayed a Slightly Smiling Face on a red label.
apple_vendor_description: As depicted on Apple devices, the cup with straw emoji is a refreshing visual, featuring a translucent, chilled beverage with subtle condensation and a brightly colored, slightly curved straw. The glossy finish and smooth shading on Apple's rendering give this everyday object a clean, modern appeal, suggesting a moment of relaxation or enjoyment. It's commonly used to signify drinks, leisure time, or a casual treat.
